name(Gleaming Meadows)

snap(-57,-57,-7)
sky(50,50,60)
fog(120,120,130)
ground(255,255,90)
polys(255,255,200)
fadefrom(8000)
density(8)
nlaps(7)
lightson()

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(20,0,5600,180)p
set(17,0,10150,0)pt
set(15,4550,10150,90)
chk(42,3848,10150,90)r
set(15,10150,10150,90)
set(35,7350,10150,90)pr
set(15,15750,10150,90)
set(17,20300,10150,-90)pt
set(15,20300,5600,0)
chk(42,20300,4397,0)r
set(20,20300,0,180)p
set(14,20300,-4550,180)pt
set(10,15750,-4550,-90)p
set(14,11200,-4550,90)pt
set(10,11200,0,180)
chk(40,11200,-1298,0)r
set(10,11200,5600,180)
set(30,11200,7487,0)pl
set(10,11200,16800,180)
set(30,11200,12675,180)pl
set(14,11200,21350,-90)
chk(40,11200,19600,0)r
set(20,6650,21350,-90)
set(21,1050,21350,90)
set(33,3850,21350,-90)pr
set(18,-4550,21350,-90)
set(19,-9100,21350,90)
chk(40,-9100,23100,0)r
set(18,-9100,25900,180)
set(19,-9100,30450,-90)pt
set(36,-10910,27720,90)
set(19,-12600,30450,90)pt
set(18,-12600,35000,180)p
set(19,-12600,39550,0)pt
set(18,-8050,39550,90)
chk(40,-8252,39550,90)r
set(19,-3500,39550,-90)pt
set(18,-3500,35000,0)p
set(22,-3500,31640,180)
chk(40,-3500,31850,0)r
set(10,-3500,28280,0)
set(30,-3500,23850,180)pl
set(10,-3500,16800,180)
set(30,-3500,18800,0)pl
set(10,-3500,11200,180)
set(10,-3500,5600,180)
set(26,-3500,7800,180)pr
set(10,-3500,0,180)p
set(14,-3500,-4550,90)
chk(40,-1750,-4550,90)r
set(14,0,-4550,180)pt
set(23,11200,25200,0)po
set(10,11200,28000,0)p
set(32,11550,28786,0)pr
set(32,10850,28786,0)
fix(41,11200,30800,-900,0)s
set(32,11550,32394,180)
set(32,10850,32394,180)
set(10,11200,33600,0)
set(23,11200,36400,180)po

maxl(11,-17690,-6500)
maxb(9,-8900,-15290)
maxr(11,25509,-6500)
maxt(9,43900,-15290)
